I remember that Sec has deactivated her Streamload
account and another person has taken up the task to
offer a free(?) storage service of Shinsengumi-related
things.

I have captured the video of the Shinsengumi play that
is still running at the Toei Uzumasa Eiga-mura about
the Ikeda Inn Affair. Went last week there and filmed
it. For those who don't know, Eiga-mura ("Movie
village") is a place maintained by Toei where many
historical soap operas (doramas) are filmed. The
entrance of the Shinsengumi headquarters in the NHK
Taiga dorama is in the Eiga-mura, as is the Ikeda Inn.

The quality is poor to save some space and to ease its
download. Even so, it is around 30MB.

So, if someone is kind enough to provide the data of
the Streamload account, I can send the movie ^^

I wish I could subtitle it, but I can't convert here
the format to .avi -_-


=====
Serizawa Kamo

"I am the bone of my sword.
    Steel is my body,and fire is my blood.
  I have created over a thousand blades.
       Unknown to Death.
   Nor known to Life.
Have withstood pain to create many weapons.
     Yet, those hands will never hold anyting.
         So as I pray, unlimited blade works."

                               (Fate/Stay Night)
